messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Now HERE's some great menuki on fleabay :-)
messages.msgSnippet: They do. But instead of folded in an envelope, they re perforated on a roll. ... From: John Berta To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com Sent: Thursday, September
messages.messageBody:
They do. But instead of folded in an envelope, they're perforated on a roll.


----- Original Message -----
From: John Berta
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, September 23, 2010 11:54 AM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Now HERE's some great menuki on fleabay :-)



I am surprised they do not come with papers.

John
----- Original Message -----
From: Jim Gilbert
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Wednesday, September 22, 2010 3:30 PM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Now HERE's some great menuki on fleabay :-)

Be sure to use proper Edo-period diagonal cutters.

----Original Message----

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Now HERE's some great menuki on fleabay :-)
messages.msgSnippet: I have a card... I am registered like a sword.  I haven t traveled in 5 years - hoping to just make it out to dinner.  One day a chance to actually make it to
messages.messageBody:
I have a card... I am registered like a sword. I haven't traveled in 5 years -
hoping to just make it out to dinner. One day a chance to actually make it to a
sword show is a hopeful dream and can actually meet some of you after over a
decade of communication. I do think it is funny that I have "known" some of you
at least 10-12 years but I could easily walk right by you never knowing what you
look like.





________________________________
From: Richard Turner <ikkanshi@...>
To: nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thu, September 23, 2010 3:51:50 AM
Subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Now HERE's some great menuki on fleabay :-)


but you'll never get through Airport's though LOL, metal detectors the
world over will be singing

messages.msgSnippet: recovering from surgery, so I already have some slicing going on.  I am a human machine.  They implanted a neuro stim in my back.  I am working on having a lot
messages.messageBody:
recovering from surgery, so I already have some slicing going on. I am a human
machine. They implanted a neuro stim in my back. I am working on having a lot
of metal in my body. I am the ultimate male... I come with a remote control now
too. Sympathy not required, free mantis welcome.





________________________________

ikkanshi@... writes:

I like the way the ends would poke into your palms>

That's to ensure a proper, secure grip....sorta like putting thumb tacks
point up on a grip to improve "hold-ability"..

JPH

Geeze...when ya think ya seen it all....

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Now HERE's some great menuki on fleabay :-)
messages.msgSnippet: I have a tsuba that might be a close match for the color, but not the motif. I call it my Don t Ask, Don t Tell tsuba - don t ask me why I bought this on
messages.messageBody:
I have a tsuba that might be a close match for the color, but not the motif.

I call it my "Don't Ask, Don't Tell" tsuba - don't ask me why I bought this
on eBay, and I won't tell anyone you bought it from me.

Craig


Craig Harris
Bridge of Dreams, LLC
Books from and about Asia
www.bridgeofdreams.com
Member, IOBA, Independent Online Booksellers Association
Member, MWABA, Midwest Antiquarian Booksellers Association
